pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Regression Models for Large Datasets using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes // Fits Gaussian univariate Bayesian spatial regression models for large datasets using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes (NNGP) detailed in Datta, Banerjee, Finley, and Gelfand (2016) doi:10.1080/01621459.2015.1044091 and Finley, Datta, Cook, Morton, Andersen, and Banerjee (2017) arXiv:1702.00434v2.
